faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: If you have doubts, click them with our frequent questions

items.a:
Macle is a 100% online institute dedicated to language teaching (English, French, Spanish and German). We have an academic coordinator, direction and finance.
In our institute you will learn languages following recognized methods worldwide and you can prepare to obtain a certification.

We have native and non -native professors, all certified in the language they teach. All our teachers, both native and non -native go through a selection process with several filters. They also have higher studies and experience in language teaching.
No. We provide you with the material you need to learn: book, exercise and audios notebook to practice. This is at no cost.

In English, French, Spanish or German class we use documents such as videos, texts, conversations audios, interactive games, flashcards and special activities for continuous oral expression and interaction (conversation).
Teachers follow the book sequences to perform an evaluation. Each sequence (didactic unit) can last 4 to 6 classes, depending on the level and language. This is an example of an English level sequence:
Discovery • Snapshot (listen and practice)
• Conversation (listen and practice)
• Grammar Focus 1 ← Pair Work/ Group Work
PRACTICE + PRODUCTION • listening
• Speaking (Discuss)
Systematization • Conversation - listen and practice
• Grammar Focus 2 ← Pair Work/ Group Work.
• Pronunciation - Speaking
Practice + Written understanding • listening
• Word Power (Vocabulary)
• Recapitulate, solve doubts
• Reading - Speaking (Discuss)

items.q: What material do you use to teach?
items.a:
In the English classes we have the Cambridge platform, which has given excellent results to millions of students around the world.

In French we follow the methods of Maison by Langues, a worldwide recognized editorial, which has won several awards for their teaching methods. In Spanish we follow the digital manuals of Campus Diffusion that give us access to the teaching of the Cervantes Institute, a public institution created in Spain in 1991 to universally promote the teaching, study and use of Spanish and contribute to the dissemination of Hispanic cultures in The exterior.
In German we follow the egg methods, which have been used for many years and have trained millions of students who have obtained very good results.

items.q: Do you deliver any constancy of study?
items.a: We give you a progress control with feedback in PDF format at the end of each unit and a diploma at the end of each level.

items.q: Can I obtain a certification at the end of a level?
items.a:
We are not exam applicators to obtain certifications but we prepare you for free certifications.
In English we prepare you to obtain a Cambridge certification. These certifications do not expire that by obtaining one, you will get it for life.
In French we prepare you to obtain the DELF and Dalf that are the official diplomas that accredit your level of mastery of the French language, which are granted by France Éduction International by the French Ministry of National Education.

In Spanish we prepare you to obtain the DELE granted by the Cervantes Institute, by the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports of Spain.
In German we prepare you to pass a Goethe-Institut exam, a cultural institution of the Federal Republic of Germany, dedicated to the dissemination of German language and culture in the world. It offers exams to prove your German level through German certificates (Goethe-Zertifikat) of all levels of the common European framework.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.short: In our institution, each teacher has the same mission: carry out their classes under the action -oriented approach or action.
mission.long:
The student must be able to perform an action.

The student has small tasks in class, missions and challenges about daily life situations. As it happens when you live abroad. In this way, the student gradually develops the ability to analyze, decipher and apply new knowledge in their social environment. On the other hand, we work with pedagogical sequences so that the student remembers in each class what the previous class saw. Each topic is related to the following: repetition is the basis for strengthening and systematizing the knowledge already acquired.

In addition, students improvise dialogues about their life, have conversations and act a social role (play play) with their classmates to function in real -life situations. This is essential since the student is a member of a society and must be able to communicate, act and interact with the other members of their environment. Our purpose is that you learn to speak, write, listen and read in the language you choose to work, travel, live abroad and/or for pleasure.

He speaks a foreign language to discover the world and understand it. Meet new people traveling or in your country. It works with international companies and is part of new real or virtual communities.

director.name: Carolina Ojeda
director.title: Academic Director
director.studies: Master in Education and Training, Dalf, Pro Fle, TKT

story.catch: Learning a language was the best decision of my life. I discovered French culture, I traveled throughout Europe, I tried unparalleled meals and I also received a salary in euros which allowed me to stay several years in France. I met new people From different cultures, even my husband. I adopted a new vision for my life: give the same opportunity to the students of this institute.
story.content:
I started my career in 2013 by teaching French in public and private universities in Mexico. With my knowledge in French I decided to apply for a scholarship as a Spanish language assistant in France. I then pursued and obtain a Master's degree in language teaching methods.

This has allowed me to bring to Mexico the experience and knowledge of the Methodology of the Council of Europe for the teaching of foreign languages. Likewise, teaching all kinds of audiences has allowed me to improve my skills to direct the institute.
